mireka.filter
Interface DataRecipientFilter

All Superinterfaces:
FilterBase
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataRecipientFilter, AcceptAllRecipient, AcceptDomainPostmaster, AcceptGlobalPostmaster, AcceptPostmaster, ProhibitRelaying, RedirectPostmasterMail, RefuseUnknownRecipient, SavePostmasterMail, StatelessFilterType, StopLoop
public interface DataRecipientFilter
extends FilterBase

a simpler alternative to Filter. It must be adapted to Filter using DataRecipientFilter

Method Summary
 void dataRecipient(MailData data, RecipientContext recipientContext)
          This method and the FilterBase.data(mireka.MailData) method are called together, the similar methods of the next filter will be called only after both methods have been run.
